about.label: About Us
about.subtitle: Smart Technology. Strong Engineering.
about.description: AD4TEC is a specialized factory providing integrated solutions for automatic vehicle & pedestrian gates, access control systems, parking management systems, and metal fabrication across Egypt.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To become the first choice in Egypt and the Middle East for electronic gates and access control solutions by delivering innovative and efficient systems.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Providing integrated solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and security, ensuring an outstanding customer experience for companies, factories, malls, resorts, and residential compounds.

expertise.label: Our Expertise
expertise.description: At AD4TEC, we combine engineering expertise, certified materials, and advanced technology to deliver secure and durable gate, access control, and parking solutions.

cards.title: On-Time Delivery
cards.desc: Committed to strict timelines and professional project execution without delays.

cards.title: Certified Quality
cards.desc: Approved products, trusted components, and compliance with industry standards.

cards.title: Technical Support & Maintenance
cards.desc: Ongoing maintenance programs and fast technical support to ensure system reliability.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: We deliver integrated gate & access solutions for modern facilities

vehicle.title: Automatic Vehicle Gates
vehicle.desc: Manufacturing and installation of durable automatic car gates with advanced control systems.

pedestrian.title: Pedestrian Access Gates
pedestrian.desc: Smart pedestrian gate systems integrated with cards, biometrics, and access control.

parking.title: Parking Management Systems
parking.desc: Complete paid parking solutions including entry gates, ticketing, monitoring, and reporting.

process.title: How We Execute Projects at AD4TEC
process.description: We follow a structured workflow ensuring quality, safety, and on-time delivery.

steps.title: Site Study & Requirements
steps.desc: Understanding client needs and conducting on-site technical assessments.

steps.title: Design & Planning
steps.desc: Preparing detailed technical designs and execution plans.

steps.title: Manufacturing & Preparation
steps.desc: Manufacturing gates and metal structures using certified materials.

steps.title: Testing & Inspection
steps.desc: Thorough testing to ensure efficiency, safety, and reliability.

steps.title: Installation & Commissioning
steps.desc: Professional installation, operation, and final handover.

steps.title: Maintenance & Technical Support
steps.desc: Continuous support and periodic maintenance programs.

trust.title: Companies trust AD4TEC to deliver reliable solutions
trust.description: High-quality manufacturing, certified systems, and reliable after-sales support.
points: Certified by the Ministry of Trade & Industry
trust.quote: At AD4TEC, we are committed to delivering high-quality electronic gates and parking solutions with precision and compliance.
